description: If the user does not supply a name, then this function will compose one based on the left and right parameters.
label: Default Name

options.name: supplied
options.label: Supplied
options.info: The string supplied by the user

options.name: left
options.label: Left
options.info: The left part of the composed string

options.name: right
options.label: Right
options.info: The left part of the composed string

options.name: result
options.label: Result
options.info: The composed or the supplied string
